# samsungcloudplatformv2_budget_budget (Data Source)

Account budget.

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "samsungcloudplatformv2" {
}

data "samsungcloudplatformv2_budget_budget" "budget"{
  id = var.budget_budget_budget_id
}


output "account_quota" {
  value = data.samsungcloudplatformv2_budget_budget.budget
}


variable "budget_budget_budget_id" {
  type    = string
  default = ""
}
```
